name: icepkg
description: The next generation of npm package development kit.

scripts.setup: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf ./packages/*/node_modules && pnpm i && pnpm run build
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm -r --filter=./packages/* run build
scripts.release:beta: changeset pre enter beta && pnpm run version && pnpm build && pnpm release && changeset pre exit
scripts.release:snapshot: changeset version --snapshot canary && pnpm install:frozen && pnpm build && pnpm release --tag canary --no-git-tag --snapshot

author: ICE Team
